metadata.name: Renamed CURL.EXE Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a renamed "CURL.exe" binary based on the PE metadata fields

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('curl.exe') AND lower(device.desc) = lower('the curl executable') AND NOT contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\curl')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a renamed "CURL.exe" binary based on the PE metadata fields
